description: This chicken cacciatore recipe is a delicious and warming one-pot meal.Â Serve the rustic Italian stew over pasta or with a side of crusty bread.
keywords: Stew,Low saturated fat,High protein,Seafood free,Low sugar,Chicken,Mushroom
name: Chicken Cacciatore Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup flatleaf parsley, leaves roughly chopped (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly coat chicken thighs and drumsticks with flour. Heat oil in a large heatproof casserole over medium heat. Cook chicken, in batches, for 810 minutes or until golden on all sides. Transfer to a plate.

Add onion, mushroom, capsicum and herbs to pan. Cook for 8 minutes or until softened. Stir in tomato and stock. Season with salt and pepper. Bring to the boil. Return chicken to pan. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 45 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Add olives. Cook for 2 minutes to heat through. Sprinkle with parsley and serve with crusty bread.
